item.title: Essentials of Data Science
item.description: There is a lot of information on Data Science on Internet. On this page I summarize the most essential things you would need to know to start working on real projects. The rest you can figure out on the way. This page is intentionally short (relativelly). Books R for Data Science An Introduction to Statistical Learning Data Science for Business Tools, Installation and updating installr package for updating R to a newer version (from RGui do installr::updateR()) installing Rtools, git, ImageMagick, etc.

item.title: Animation Overview
item.description: A short review of some methods allowing to create animations in R is presented bellow. Available options library(animation) saveGIF (relies on ImageMagick or GraphicsMagick) saveVideo saveMovie saveHTML other functions here magick package for ImageMagick use in R gganimate additional use of package tweenr makes a result smother animated maps write.gif from caTools from matrix of data or 3D array directly to gif file
